definition: Zhumadian prefecture level city in Henan
to halt/to stay/to be stationed (of troops, diplomats etc)
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: The city of Zhumadian is an area with better natural conditions but less-developed economy.
sentences.chinese: 駐馬店市是一個自然條件較好但經濟欠發達的地區。
